channel.title: Ultimate Sans Undertale (END) - Epic Win for Pacifist Faction
channel.description:
![ultimate%20sans%20fm|690x388](upload://3QbohzJROdC1hnmhJRgXCuWRIPk.png)
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days/72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 day/24 hours long Actions are done by messaging me The Genocide Faction will talk through a Forum DM. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. This is a Smalltown game, therefore everyone's class names will show up on thread and there are no bullshit post restrictions.
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority has been reached. That player will be flipped.
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you. Minimal feedback is in play here. There are no abilities which change flips.
### Journals There are no logbooks in this game.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Living Players: 1. MaximusPrime - [color=blue]**Sans Gaming**[/color] 2. BlueStorm - [color=mediumpurple]**Jevil**[/color] 5. Hjasik - [color=red]**Ness**[/color] 7. Luxy - [color=dimgray]**Frank Reynolds**[/color] 8. Frostwolf - [color=darkgreen]**Peter Griffin**[/color] 9. DatBird - [color=lightgrey]**Skeletron**[/color] 10. Zone_Q11 - [color=lightblue]**Silento**[/color] 12. Margaret - [color=seagreen]**Nagito Komaeda**[/color]
### Graveyard: Lv. 110 Mafia Boss - [color=lime]**Kanye West**[/color] **- Lynched D1** Geyde - [color=red]**Skull Trooper**[/color] **- Killed N1** Squid - [color=red]**Sans Brother**[/color] **- Lynched D2** bazingaboy - [color=RED]**Sans**[/color] **- Surrendered**
### Timestamp: [Day 1 - Mrs Obama, it's been an honour](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-sans-undertale-game-thread-day-1-lynches-in-his-ass-sunday/74896/2?u=pug) [Night 1 - A Fingering Source of Fear](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-sans-undertale-game-thread-day-1-mrs-obama-its-been-an-honour/74896/385?u=pug) [Day 2 - No Fortnite](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-sans-undertale-game-thread-day-2-no-fortnite/74896/390?u=pug)

All I said. But I think host made right decision ending game cause I think I was screwed anyway.

item.dc:creator: Emilia
item.description:
Pacifist Faction
“okay.”
You are Ness. The Psychic Kid from the Town of Onett.
As you have PSI Lifeup γ. You may heal a player, curing them of all status effects.
Your wincon is to defeat all the genocide faction members
